maldives.name: Maldives
maldives.climate: Tropical; warm year-round with monsoon seasons
maldives.speciality: Overwater villas, pristine reefs, turquoise lagoons
maldives.culture: Island nation with strong Islamic traditions and seafaring heritage.

essentialTips.title: Resort Transfers
essentialTips.note: Many islands require speedboat or seaplane transfers.

essentialTips.title: Dress Code
essentialTips.note: Modest dress in local islands; resorts are relaxed.

faqs.a: Available in resorts; restricted on local islands.
Nov–Apr for calm seas and clear skies.
